versionList.changeLog: Fixed server-side crash when opening Sorting Iron Chests, fixed Inventory Tweaks weirdness, added easy update/changlog command, Buffers now don't accept items when they can't output them.
Fixed server-side crash when opening Sorting Iron Chests, fixed Inventory Tweaks weirdness, added easy update/changlog command, Buffers now don't accept items when they can't output them.
